name: Zoey’s Journey - Love & Pain
description:
Epic romance? Amazing friends? Exciting puzzles? Zoey’s Journey has it ALL! After a dramatic turn of events, Zoey is ready for a brand new start! Solve challenging match-3 levels, make story choices, help Zoey decorate a new house, and get to know all the (cute) neighbors! Sit down, relax and get ready for this exciting puzzle game with all kinds of romantic twists and turns!

Features:

ZOEY’S JOURNEY & CHOICES - Enjoy a captivating and dramatic story filled with love, romance, heartbreak, and true friendship! Plus, make choices to further progress in the game!

DRAMA & CHARACTERS - Meet a variety of fabulous, dramatic, and quirky characters, plus an adorable fluffy cat!

RENOVATE & DECORATE - Remodel unique rooms and areas for the ultimate makeover experience!

MATCH & BLAST - Beat challenging match-3 puzzles and use powerful boosters along the way!

EVENTS & REWARDS - Play and compete in special events to earn amazing rewards!

MAKE FRIENDS & CONNECT - Connect with other players, join a squad and make new friends!

Solve challenging puzzles, follow along with a romantic love story, make choices and show off your home decoration skills.
